content: I am a PhD candidate at UCLA, working with Dr. Jacob Rosen in the Bionic Lab. My PhD research focuses on developing intelligent algorithms which would enable the next generation of surgical robotics to go beyond teleoperation. In particular, I am exploring Automation of Surgical Subtasks as well as Robot Surgeon Collaboration for various surgical scenarios including suturing, tissue grasping and manipulation, and tissue dissection.

title: Sahba Aghajani Pedram
